meanings.sent1: The playground was busier than usual during recess.
meanings.sent2: She felt busier than ever with all the tasks on her to-do list.
meanings.sent3: The ants were busier than a bee in a flower garden.
meanings.sent4: The city streets were busier than a beehive at rush hour.
meanings.sent5: The factory was busier than a squirrel gathering nuts for winter.

meanings.definition: Having a lot of things to do
meanings.sent1: The students were busier than bees preparing for the spelling bee.
meanings.sent2: He always seemed busier on Mondays with all the meetings scheduled.
meanings.sent3: The kitchen was busier than a chef during a cooking competition.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was busier than a library during exam week.
meanings.sent5: The office was busier than a shopping mall on Black Friday.

meanings.sent1: The park was busier than a carnival on a sunny day.
meanings.sent2: The town center was busier than usual due to the festival.
meanings.sent3: The classroom was busier than a zoo with all the students talking.
meanings.sent4: The market was busier than a train station during rush hour.
meanings.sent5: The beach was busier than a beehive with families enjoying the sun.
